title: Some people catfish themselves
body:
mmo is just hurting

http://i.imgur.com/bQYE3tQ.jpg[/img]

I don't to be an ass and share the conversation I had, it's hurting
The white knight mind set give these people(people like you) the idea that if they help someone they can get something out of it. and they're angry at others("alphas" because "alphas" date all the girls it's projection to the extreme, Is not the alphas that's the problem

is because they are looking for a girlfriend on a mmo


by the way screenshots taken at highest setting with new 970 gtx video card
